deserialize¶

zserio.deserialize(objClass: Type[Any], bitBuffer: zserio.bitbuffer.BitBuffer, *args) → Any[source]¶

Deserializes bit buffer to the generated object.

Parameters

  • objClass – Class instance of the generated object to deserialize.

  • bitBuffer – Bit buffer which represents generated object in binary format.

  • args – Additional arguments needed for objClass.fromReader method.

Returns

Generated object created from given bit buffer.

Raises

PythonRuntimeException – Throws in case of any error during deserialization.

Previous topic

Zserio Python runtime library documentation

Next topic

deserializeBytes
